items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t have had anything to do with what happened last week.
It was very windy that day, and I had my umbrella blown inside out.
Mary wanted me to look the other way while she was getting dressed.
Tom was so confused that he didn\'t even know what question to ask.
Do your really want to be doing this job for the rest of your life?
If you want to stay at my place when you\'re in Boston, that\'s OK.
I hope I\'ll have a chance to see you the next time I\'m in Boston.
Would you see if you could find out what\'s causing all that noise?
You know me well enough to know I wouldn\'t do something like that.
Tom lives in the apartment building on the other side of this park.
